title: literally over 1,000 ranked games; so who will the special Riot guest be?
body:
i would like someone from Riot to play a few nexus blitz games with me! who will the special guest be? hehe. 
POG
<3

replies.body: Inb4 you get a silver IV from customer support who plays a mean full AP blitzcrank.
I think this is a great idea! <3
